trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with SilkRoad Life Suite | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with SilkRoad Life Suite | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Azure Active Directory and SilkRoad Life Suite.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Azure Active Directory and SilkRoad Life Suite.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with SilkRoad Life Suite
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with SilkRoad Life Suite

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show you how to integrate SilkRoad Life Suite with Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show you how to integrate SilkRoad Life Suite with Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).

trans-unit.source: Integrating SilkRoad Life Suite with Azure AD provides you with the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: Integrating SilkRoad Life Suite with Azure AD provides you with the following benefits:

trans-unit.source: You can control in Azure AD who has access to SilkRoad Life Suite
trans-unit.target: You can control in Azure AD who has access to SilkRoad Life Suite

trans-unit.source: You can enable your users to automatically get signed-on to SilkRoad Life Suite (Single Sign-On) with their Azure AD accounts
trans-unit.target: You can enable your users to automatically get signed-on to SilkRoad Life Suite (Single Sign-On) with their Azure AD accounts

trans-unit.source: If you want to know more details about SaaS app integration with Azure AD, see [What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-appssoaccess-whatis.md).
trans-unit.target: If you want to know more details about SaaS app integration with Azure AD, see [What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory](active-directory-appssoaccess-whatis.md).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: To configure Azure AD integration with SilkRoad Life Suite, you need the following items:
trans-unit.target: To configure Azure AD integration with SilkRoad Life Suite, you need the following items:

trans-unit.source: An Azure AD subscription
trans-unit.target: An Azure AD subscription

trans-unit.source: A SilkRoad Life Suite single-sign on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A SilkRoad Life Suite single-sign on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] To test the steps in this tutorial, we do not recommend using a production environment.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] To test the steps in this tutorial, we do not recommend using a production environment.

trans-unit.source: To test the steps in this tutorial, you should follow these recommendations:
trans-unit.target: To test the steps in this tutorial, you should follow these recommendations:

trans-unit.source: You should not use your production environment, unless this is necessary.
trans-unit.target: You should not use your production environment, unless this is necessary.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an Azure AD trial environment, you can get a one-month trial [here](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an Azure AD trial environment, you can get a one-month trial [here](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: Scenario Description
trans-unit.target: Scenario Description

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to enable you to test Azure AD single sign-on in a test environment.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to enable you to test Azure AD single sign-on in a test environment.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of two main building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of two main building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Adding SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery
trans-unit.target: Adding SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery

trans-unit.source: Configuring and testing Azure AD single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring and testing Azure AD single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Adding SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery
trans-unit.target: Adding SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery

trans-unit.source: To configure the integration of SilkRoad Life Suite into Azure AD, you need to add SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery to your list of managed SaaS apps.
trans-unit.target: To configure the integration of SilkRoad Life Suite into Azure AD, you need to add SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery to your list of managed SaaS apps.

trans-unit.source: To add SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To add SilkRoad Life Suite from the gallery, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the **Azure Management Portal**, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Azure Management Portal**, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: ![Active Directory][1]
trans-unit.target: ![Active Directory][1]

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][2]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][2]

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][3]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][3]

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][4]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][4]

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type **SilkRoad Life Suite**.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type **SilkRoad Life Suite**.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][5]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][5]

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **SilkRoad Life Suite**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **SilkRoad Life Suite**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: ![Applications][50]
trans-unit.target: ![Applications][50]

trans-unit.source: Configuring and testing Azure AD single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring and testing Azure AD single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to show you how to configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SilkRoad Life Suite based on a test user called "Britta Simon".
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to show you how to configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SilkRoad Life Suite based on a test user called "Britta Simon".

trans-unit.source: For single sign-on to work, Azure AD needs to know what the counterpart user in SilkRoad Life Suite to an user in Azure AD is.
trans-unit.target: For single sign-on to work, Azure AD needs to know what the counterpart user in SilkRoad Life Suite to an user in Azure AD is.

trans-unit.source: In other words, a link relationship between an Azure AD user and the related user in SilkRoad Life Suite needs to be established.
trans-unit.target: In other words, a link relationship between an Azure AD user and the related user in SilkRoad Life Suite needs to be established.

trans-unit.source: This link relationship is established by assigning the value of the **user name** in Azure AD as the value of the **Username** in SilkRoad Life Suite.
trans-unit.target: This link relationship is established by assigning the value of the **user name** in Azure AD as the value of the **Username** in SilkRoad Life Suite.

trans-unit.source: To configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SilkRoad Life Suite, you need to complete the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: To configure and test Azure AD single sign-on with SilkRoad Life Suite, you need to complete the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: **[Configuring Azure AD Single Sign-On](#configuring-azure-ad-single-single-sign-on)** - to enable your users to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: **[Configuring Azure AD Single Sign-On](#configuring-azure-ad-single-single-sign-on)** - to enable your users to use this feature.

trans-unit.source: **[Creating an Azure AD test user](#creating-an-azure-ad-test-user)** - to test Azure AD single sign-on with Britta Simon.
trans-unit.target: **[Creating an Azure AD test user](#creating-an-azure-ad-test-user)** - to test Azure AD single sign-on with Britta Simon.

trans-unit.source: **[Creating a SilkRoad Life Suite test user](#creating-a-silkroad-life-suite-test-user)** - to have a counterpart of Britta Simon in SilkRoad Life Suite that is linked to the Azure AD representation of her.
trans-unit.target: **[Creating a SilkRoad Life Suite test user](#creating-a-silkroad-life-suite-test-user)** - to have a counterpart of Britta Simon in SilkRoad Life Suite that is linked to the Azure AD representation of her.

trans-unit.source: **[Assigning the Azure AD test user](#assigning-the-azure-ad-test-user)** - to enable Britta Simon to use Azure AD single sign-on.
trans-unit.target: **[Assigning the Azure AD test user](#assigning-the-azure-ad-test-user)** - to enable Britta Simon to use Azure AD single sign-on.

trans-unit.source: **[Testing Single Sign-On](#testing-single-sign-on)** - to verify whether the configuration works.
trans-unit.target: **[Testing Single Sign-On](#testing-single-sign-on)** - to verify whether the configuration works.

trans-unit.source: Configuring Azure AD Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configuring Azure AD Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to enable Azure AD single sign-on in the Azure AD portal and to configure single sign-on in your SilkRoad Life Suite application.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to enable Azure AD single sign-on in the Azure AD portal and to configure single sign-on in your SilkRoad Life Suite application.

trans-unit.source: To configure Azure AD single sign-on with SilkRoad Life Suite, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure Azure AD single sign-on with SilkRoad Life Suite, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Sign-on to your SilkRoad company site as administrator.
trans-unit.target: Sign-on to your SilkRoad company site as administrator.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] To obtain access to the SilkRoad Life Suite Authentication application for configuring federation with Microsoft Azure AD, please contact SilkRoad Support or your SilkRoad Services representative.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] To obtain access to the SilkRoad Life Suite Authentication application for configuring federation with Microsoft Azure AD, please contact SilkRoad Support or your SilkRoad Services representative.

trans-unit.source: Go to **Service Provider**, and then clcik **Federation Details**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Service Provider**, and then clcik **Federation Details**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][10]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][10]

trans-unit.source: Click **Download Federation Metadata**, and then save the metadata file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: Click **Download Federation Metadata**, and then save the metadata file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][11]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][11]

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **SilkRoad Life Suite** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign-On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **SilkRoad Life Suite** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign-On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure Single Sign-On][6]
trans-unit.target: ![Configure Single Sign-On][6]

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to SilkRoad Life Suite** page, select **Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to SilkRoad Life Suite** page, select **Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][7]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][7]

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App Settings** dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App Settings** dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][8]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][8]

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: In the **Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign-on to your SilkRoad Life Suite site (e.g.: *https://defcompanytest-test-redcarpet.silkroad-eng.com/Authentication/*).
trans-unit.target: In the **Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign-on to your SilkRoad Life Suite site (e.g.: *https://defcompanytest-test-redcarpet.silkroad-eng.com/Authentication/*).

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Open the downloaded **Silkroad** metadata file.
trans-unit.target: Open the downloaded **Silkroad** metadata file.

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: Locate the **AssertionConsumerService** tag, and then copy the **Location** attribute.
trans-unit.target: Locate the **AssertionConsumerService** tag, and then copy the **Location** attribute.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][21]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][21]

trans-unit.source: d.
trans-unit.target: d.

trans-unit.source: Paste the value into the **Reply URL** textbox.
trans-unit.target: Paste the value into the **Reply URL** textbox.

trans-unit.source: e.
trans-unit.target: e.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at SilkRoad Life Suite** page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at SilkRoad Life Suite** page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][9]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][9]

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: Click Download certificate, and then save the file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: Click Download certificate, and then save the file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: In your **SilkRoad** application, click **Authentication Sources**.
trans-unit.target: In your **SilkRoad** application, click **Authentication Sources**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][12]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][12]

trans-unit.source: Click **Add Authentication Source**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add Authentication Source**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][13]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][13]

trans-unit.source: In the **Add Authentication Source** section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the **Add Authentication Source** section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][14]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][14]

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: Under **Option 2 - Metadata File**, click **Browse** to upload the downloaded metadata file.
trans-unit.target: Under **Option 2 - Metadata File**, click **Browse** to upload the downloaded metadata file.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create Identity Provider using File Data**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create Identity Provider using File Data**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Authentication Sources** section, click **Edit**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Authentication Sources** section, click **Edit**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][15]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][15]

trans-unit.source: On the **Edit Authentication Source** dialog, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Edit Authentication Source** dialog, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][16]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][16]

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: As **Enabled**, select **Yes**.
trans-unit.target: As **Enabled**, select **Yes**.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: In the **IdP Description** textbox, type a description for your configuration (e.g.: *Azure AD SSO*).
trans-unit.target: In the **IdP Description** textbox, type a description for your configuration (e.g.: *Azure AD SSO*).

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: In the **IdP Name** textbox, type a name that is specific to your configuration (e.g.: *Azure SP*).
trans-unit.target: In the **IdP Name** textbox, type a name that is specific to your configuration (e.g.: *Azure SP*).

trans-unit.source: d.
trans-unit.target: d.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Disable all other authentication sources.
trans-unit.target: Disable all other authentication sources.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][18]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][18]

trans-unit.source: On the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Single sign-on confirmation** page, click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][19]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure AD Single Sign-On][19]

trans-unit.source: Creating an Azure AD test user
trans-unit.target: Creating an Azure AD test user

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to create a test user in the Azure portal called Britta Simon.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to create a test user in the Azure portal called Britta Simon.

trans-unit.source: In the Users list, select **Britta Simon**.
trans-unit.target: In the Users list, select **Britta Simon**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create Azure AD User][20]
trans-unit.target: ![Create Azure AD User][20]

trans-unit.source: To create a test user in Azure AD, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To create a test user in Azure AD, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the **Azure Management Portal**, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Azure Management Portal**, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_09.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_09.png)

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To display the list of users, in the menu on the top, click **Users**.
trans-unit.target: To display the list of users, in the menu on the top, click **Users**.

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_03.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_03.png)

trans-unit.source: To open the **Add User** dialog, in the toolbar on the bottom, click **Add User**.
trans-unit.target: To open the **Add User** dialog, in the toolbar on the bottom, click **Add User**.

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_04.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_04.png)

trans-unit.source: On the **Tell us about this user** dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Tell us about this user** dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_05.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_05.png)

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: As Type Of User, select New user in your organization.
trans-unit.target: As Type Of User, select New user in your organization.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: In the User Name **textbox**, type **BrittaSimon**.
trans-unit.target: In the User Name **textbox**, type **BrittaSimon**.

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **User Profile** dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **User Profile** dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_06.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_06.png)

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: In the **First Name** textbox, type **Britta**.
trans-unit.target: In the **First Name** textbox, type **Britta**.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: In the **Last Name** textbox, type, **Simon**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Last Name** textbox, type, **Simon**.

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: In the **Display Name** textbox, type **Britta Simon**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Display Name** textbox, type **Britta Simon**.

trans-unit.source: d.
trans-unit.target: d.

trans-unit.source: In the **Role** list, select **User**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Role** list, select **User**.

trans-unit.source: e.
trans-unit.target: e.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Get temporary password** dialog page, click **create**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Get temporary password** dialog page, click **create**.

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_07.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_07.png)

trans-unit.source: On the **Get temporary password** dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Get temporary password** dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_08.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Creating an Azure AD test user](./media/active-directory-saas-silkroad-life-suite-tutorial/create_aaduser_08.png)

trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: Write down the value of the **New Password**.
trans-unit.target: Write down the value of the **New Password**.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: Creating a SilkRoad Life Suite test user
trans-unit.target: Creating a SilkRoad Life Suite test user

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to create a user called Britta Simon in SilkRoad Life Suite.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to create a user called Britta Simon in SilkRoad Life Suite.

trans-unit.source: Britta's must have an SSO ID (sometimes referred to as an *AuthParam*) that matches Britta's **emailaddress** in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Britta's must have an SSO ID (sometimes referred to as an *AuthParam*) that matches Britta's **emailaddress** in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: To create a user called Britta Simon in SilkRoad Life Suite, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To create a user called Britta Simon in SilkRoad Life Suite, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Ask your SilkRoad Life Suite support team to create a user that has as **SSO ID** attribute the same value as the **emailaddress** of Britta Simon in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: Ask your SilkRoad Life Suite support team to create a user that has as **SSO ID** attribute the same value as the **emailaddress** of Britta Simon in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: Assigning the Azure AD test user
trans-unit.target: Assigning the Azure AD test user

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to enabling Britta Simon to use Azure single sign-on by granting her access to SilkRoad Life Suite.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to enabling Britta Simon to use Azure single sign-on by granting her access to SilkRoad Life Suite.

trans-unit.source: Assign User
trans-unit.target: Assign User

trans-unit.source: To assign Britta Simon to SilkRoad Life Suite, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign Britta Simon to SilkRoad Life Suite, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: On the Azure portal, to open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure portal, to open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: ![Assign User][201]
trans-unit.target: ![Assign User][201]

trans-unit.source: In the applications list, select **SilkRoad Life Suite**.
trans-unit.target: In the applications list, select **SilkRoad Life Suite**.

trans-unit.source: ![Assign User][202]
trans-unit.target: ![Assign User][202]

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click **Users**.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click **Users**.

trans-unit.source: ![Assign User][203]
trans-unit.target: ![Assign User][203]

trans-unit.source: In the Users list, select **Britta Simon**.
trans-unit.target: In the Users list, select **Britta Simon**.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar on the bottom, click **Assign**.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar on the bottom, click **Assign**.

trans-unit.source: ![Assign User][205]
trans-unit.target: ![Assign User][205]

trans-unit.source: Testing Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Testing Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to test your Azure AD single sign-on configuration using the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to test your Azure AD single sign-on configuration using the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: When you click the SilkRoad Life Suite tile in the Access Panel, you should get automatically signed-on to your SilkRoad Life Suite application.
trans-unit.target: When you click the SilkRoad Life Suite tile in the Access Panel, you should get automatically signed-on to your SilkRoad Life Suite application.

trans-unit.source: What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory?
trans-unit.target: What is application access and single sign-on with Azure Active Directory?
